casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua BOLEN 193P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Joshua Bolen, for Bolen, Joshua. C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2018 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
